group_1.textCenter: I've gotta keep away from there~

group_1.textLeft: Hikaru?

group_1.textRight: I figured you'd be close by.

group_1.textLeft: Close enough to use telepathy~
I bet one of them will take notice soonish @and they'll head for Monzenbashi~

group_1.textRight: If so, then both sides will probably just @regroup, and the fighting shouldn't get too crazy...

group_1.textLeft: Right~?
The two gangs will just stare each other down~

group_1.textRight: Make sure you don't get too close to there, @alright?

group_1.textLeft: Of course!
So, where's Torayamachi's sniper team at?

group_1.textRight: They're planning on shootin' down the @entire enemy team in one volley.

group_1.textLeft: And after that?

group_1.textRight: They're gonna split up and use their knowledge @of the city for guerilla warfare.

group_1.textLeft: ...That's not a very Yuna strat~

group_1.textRight: Maybe there's somethin' more to it, but...
I dunno what it could be...

group_1.textLeft: If the plan really plays out like that,
then Juri will confront Yuna and challenge @her to a one-on-one fight~
I'm pretty sure that's what Juri's wanted @from the start~

group_1.textRight: Then is that where you'll accomplish @your objective?
If we can defeat both Yuna and Juri...

group_1.textLeft: No, it won't mean a thing unless we can @wipe out all the other members as well.
That's the only way to end the exploitation.

group_1.textRight: Th-that's way too tall of an order!

group_1.textLeft: Then what do you think we should do@instead~...?
Well, maybe there's still a chance~

We're going with a new strat~@[chara:102300:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:102300:cheek_0][chara:102300:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:102300:lipSynch_1]With this, it should be an easy Mission Complete~
Heheh...
We're going to create a situation where Yuna @has to chase down Juri in their fight
so that they'll end up in the construction @site near Monzenbashi~
And if we can get the rest of the gangs @to group up around there too...
We, Janomiya, will have a good chance @of winning~
This mission will need a high luck stat, @but it should still be Normal Mode.
